items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, comfortable and great value!
items.body: 5’9 205 lbs very curvy-bought XL Beautiful dress. Arms are very generous. Although this is a “midi” dress, I would say it’s longer. I wore it with boots and it was perfect. It is Avery comfortable dress that I look forward to wearing to all types of occasions. I feel like with the endless possibilities of occasions I can wear it that this was a fantastic value! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and comfortable.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Arms are too long
items.body: Elegant! So comfortable and got a lot of compliments. Looks pricier than it is! The length of the arms is too long, many reviews stated this. I just had to roll them. Only complaint! Washed and dried well. Read more
items.author: Sam

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t love it
items.body: Good material, thick but not hot. I bought the burgundy and it has a very orange tint to it. The sizing is also very small and short. I’m 5’9” and the skirt hit just below my kneecap. Returning. Read more
items.author: Jaime Varley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Work Sweater Dress!
items.body: This is a review for KIRUNDO ribbed knit sweater dress in baby blue, size small. This dress is absolutely beautiful and very comfortable to wear all day. The ribbed knit fabric feels soft and high quality, and it is not see through at all. You can faintly see the outline of a bra underneath, but nothing that would make it inappropriate for work. The fit is true to size and very flattering without being tight or restrictive, making it easy to move and sit comfortably throughout the day. I have worn this dress multiple times to work and it holds up extremely well. I wash it in the washer and dryer on normal settings and it comes out looking perfect every time. It does not wrinkle easily, which makes it great for busy mornings or travel. The pleated skirt gives it a polished look that feels professional but still feminine. The color is stunning in person, more of a soft periwinkle than a basic blue, and it looks even better than the photos. For the quality, comfort, and versatility, this dress is very affordable and feels like a great value. I would absolutely recommend it for anyone looking for an easy, elegant work dress that lasts. Read more
items.author: Laura

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Baby Blue, Navy, White, Burgundy, Light Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
